  • Github

This project contains a basic starting point for a Progressive Web Application.

It is built without any complex frontend frameworks, to illustrate that you don't necessarily need those to get a PWA up and running.

To get a taste, try playing around with notifications below! âœ¨

Notifications

Write a text below and see it appear in a notification.

Push messages

To test out push messages locally, open devtools (F12) and navigate to the Application tab.

Click on 'Service Workers' and you will be able to send a push message from the browser.

App-like experience

Using Chrome? Try installing this app and going offline!
